name: semantic-bus-monorepo
description: ETL style data middleware transformation embedded in an ESB for all kind of data

scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration:auth && npm run test:integration:user && npm run test:integration:workspaces
scripts.test:e2e:optional: echo 'E2E tests require Docker Compose. Run: make test-build && make test-start'
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:engine
scripts.install:all: npm run install:engine && npm run install:main && npm run install:timer && npm run install:core && npm run install:tests
scripts.lint: npm run lint:engine && npm run lint:main
scripts.clean: npm run clean:engine && npm run clean:main && npm run clean:timer && npm run clean:core

author: Simon Louvet <simon.louvet.zen@gmail.com> && Boceno Alexandre <bocenoalex@gmail.com>
